name: Path of Peril (Puzzle Game)
description:
Nothing drives people through deadly traps better than gold! Created for Alakajam 2021, where the theme was ancient ruins, Path of Peril tests the player's strategy above all else. Carefully move your character through the dangerous traps, and maybe just maybe, that treasure could be yours.

-8 levels!

-9 board elements!

-Simple controls!
